title: Walter and Milly went to read (TEFC)
creator_credit: Film Australia, Tom Manefield and Karl McPhee
brief_description: Study of the reading abilities of children. Walter and Milly are ordinary children encountering the developmental tasks of their respective ages, with the usual successes and failures. Their parents and teachers try to create the best learning environment for the children. Photographer, John Hoskins; editor, Mark Waters; sound, Max Henser, Julian Ellingworth; music, Michael Carlos.
